ComTalk_016:
<snd:TalkPositive>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can <clr:0000>greatly<clr:ffff> enhance your clothing!
ComTalk_017:
<snd:TalkPositive>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>I can
enhance your clothing <clr:0000>to the maximum<clr:ffff>!
ComTalk_030:
<snd:Notice>You don't have the materials I need to
work my magic! Once you have them all,
come back to see me!
ComTalk_031:
<snd:Think>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>You don't have the materials I need.
There isn't a lot I can do if you don't have
the materials...
ComTalk_032:
<snd:Notice>If you want me to enhance that clothing
item,<sp:5:0:0> you're going to have to bring me
the materials...
ComTalk_033:
<snd:QuestionNormal>You don't have the materials needed to
enhance that clothing item,<sp:5:0:0> so I can't do
it. What a bother.
ComTalk_034: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh? No need to be shy, you know.
ComTalk_001:
<snd:TalkPositive>...You came to me to have your clothing
enhanced, right?
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I came here to be close to a <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>, where
I could offer my blessings to travelers.

But now, until I hear a <clr:0000>violin<clr:ffff> played by a
musician in a troupe...<sp:5:0:0>

I can't bear the thought of ever going
outside ever again.
ComTalk_003:
<snd:TalkPositive>It seems my little sisters are still
secluding themselves in their flower
buds in distress.
If you see a giant <clr:0000>flower bud <clr:ffff>as you
journey through Hyrule, <sp:5:0:0>please play
lovely music for them too.
ComTalk_038:
<snd:TalkPositive>It seems <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> <sp:5:1:0>of my little sisters is still
secluding herself in her flower bud.

If you see a giant <clr:0000>flower bud <clr:ffff>as you
journey through Hyrule, <sp:5:0:0>please play
lovely music for her too.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'd hoped to offer travelers my <clr:0000>blessing
of clothing enhancement<clr:ffff>. So many need
help in these trying times.
Then I learned that the land had been
lost to gloom and monsters, and I knew
no one would endure such a world.
Perhaps if I heard a <clr:0000>violin<clr:ffff> played in a
musical troupe,<sp:5:0:0> I could bear the thought
of being outside again.
ComTalk_004:
<snd:Happy>It seems that all of my sisters have
emerged from their flower buds.

If you ever have need of our power,<sp:5:0:0> just
stop on by.
ComTalk_039:
<snd:Happy>All done! Amazing! Very fine work,
I must say.

A resourceful hero like you surely wants
to unlock even greater potential, yes?

Some sets—if you enhance each part of
the set twice—will give you a <clr:0000>special
bonus<clr:ffff> when you wear them.
Not every set, mind you!<sp:5:1:0> But some...
ComTalk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wanted to make some of your other
clothes stronger,<sp:5:0:0> but that just doesn't
seem possible.
ComTalk_051:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Perfection!<sp:5:1:0> It's almost TOO beautiful,
if I do say so myself.
ComTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You are lacking either the clothes or the
materials...<sp:5:0:0> Or perhaps if I had access to
my sisters' powers...
ComTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>When you're carrying the clothes and
materials with you,<sp:5:0:0> please come back
and visit me here!
ComTalk_054:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>It's just right! Look how much stronger
and sturdier it is!
ComTalk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Which clothing item would you like me
to enhance?
ComTalk_022:
<snd:Sad>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>It looks like it is impossible for me
to enhance that clothing item...
ComTalk_023:
<snd:Angry>I'm sorrrry!<sp:5:0:0> There are some clothing
items that I cannot enhance, even at
my power level.
ComTalk_101:
<snd:Notice>It looks you don't have enough rupees.
My power won't function without funds,
I fear.
ComTalk_024:
<snd:Sad>Hmmm... <sp:5:0:0>It is impossible for me to
enhance that clothing item...
ComTalk_102:
<snd:Think>Oh dear! <sp:5:0:0>You know you don't have
enough rupees, don't you? My powers
just won't manifest without rupees.
ComTalk_025:
<snd:Sad>That clothing item... It's just not
possible...<sp:5:0:0> Even I have my limits.
ComTalk_103:
<snd:Notice>If you want me to enhance that clothing,<sp:5:0:0>
then you'll need more rupees on hand!
ComTalk_026:
<snd:Sad>I can't enhance that item now! If my
sisters were revitalized as well,
that would be a different story...
ComTalk_104:
<snd:QuestionNormal>Without the necessary rupees,<sp:5:0:0> then I'm
afraid I can't grant you my blessing.
ComTalk_027:
<snd:Sad>I cannot enhance that with my power
alone, you know? I would need the help
of my sisters as well.
ComTalk_028:
<snd:Sad>Ahh. <sp:5:0:0>There's no way I can enhance that
clothing item! Not with my power alone.
ComTalk_029:
<snd:TalkPositive>If you want me to enhance that clothing
item,<sp:5:0:0> you will need to aid my sisters.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I know what you are...<sp:5:1:0>monster.


You've come for my <clr:0000>blessing of clothing
enhancement<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've heard this land is now smothered in
gloom and overrun with monsters. 

Oh! I'll never hear a musical troupe
pass by again, and the sweet notes
of its <clr:0000>violin <clr:ffff>player...
I'm staying sealed up in my flower bud
for the rest of eternity—or until I hear
a violin in the world once more!
ComTalk_042:
<snd:Think_01>My little sister Kaysa said she was going
to a stable near the Gerudo region
southwest from here.
ComTalk_043:
<snd:Think_01>My little sister Mija said she was going to
a stable in Hebra in the northwest.
ComTalk_044:
<snd:Think_01>My little sister Cotera said she was going
to a stable near the Dueling Peaks in
Necluda to the south.
ComTalk_045:
<snd:TalkPositive>It seems <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> <sp:5:1:0>of my little sisters are still
secluding themselves in their flower buds.

If you see a giant <clr:0000>flower bud <clr:ffff>as you
journey through Hyrule, <sp:5:0:0>please play
lovely music for them too.
Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Hmm. It smells a bit of gloom, I think.
ComTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see... What's stopping me from
enhancing these things, I wonder...
ComTalk_046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, some sets—if you enhance
each part of the set twice—will give you
a <clr:0000>special bonus<clr:ffff>. Why don't you try?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It seems that the world is still in a
wretched state.
ComTalk_012:
<snd:QuestionNormal>Ah. Ignoring the fact that you're going to
get an awful sunburn walking around like
that during the day...
Do you really not have any clothing?
When you get some clothing that I can
enhance, come visit and I'll do my thing!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Maybe I'm imagining it, but my throat
doesn't feel quite right. Perhaps it's
because of the gloom.
ComTalk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>What's this?<sp:5:1:0> You don't have any clothes
that I can enhance? None at all?

How about we take a look, just to be
sure.<sp:5:1:0> Let me see what you have.
ComTalk_014:
<snd:TalkPositive>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I should be able to enhance your
clothing <clr:0000>a little bit<clr:ffff>!
ComTalk_015:
<snd:TalkPositive>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can enhance your clothing
<clr:0000>a fair amount<clr:ffff>!
